dc_title_s: Suffolciae nova et accurata delineatio; Joannes Janssonius exudit.; Svffolciae nova et accurata delineatio;Suffolk
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Title is flanked by a man and woman, each wearing Roman armor. The man has a shield and leaves, and the woman has a lance and a shield bearing a gorgon's head. Beneath the title is the British coat of arms. Ships are in the ocean, and a cherub at the bottom left examines the scale. Does not match any states listed in Van der Krogt. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
